Author: jl777c#5810
Content: I forgot to add a bit of sleep in my polling loop. that is why CPU usage was so much

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: now it is 10% to 20%, with peaks to 50%.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: had to take the dealer node offline for a few minutes. had a 200 bet backlog, which it cleared in a few seconds

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it not only seems to keep up in realtime with plenty to spare, but i think i can catch up thousands of bets per block if ever it is offline for some time

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and best of all, it appears to be processing every last dicebet. no edge cases that confuse it anymore

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Awesome work üëç

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: once you understand how i did it, i think it will help you with any of your realtime processing stuff

Author: jl777c#5810
Content:
fixed a deadlock (maybe more exists under high load)
added basic refund validation
automatically creates 0.0002 utxos for the parallel txconstruction and also creates 0.023 utxo that are needed to fund the sendmany 0.0002
reduced CPU usage now it ranges from 1% to 20% maybe under stress test it will go up

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: all that seems left is to fix whatever bugs a massive stress test finds, oh, and changing the silly linear searches to hashtables, that will make it go even faster

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: KMDICE is ready for a mass stress test
